activities: RedOwl receives personal information from the EU during client engagements and only at the request of our clients.  The personal information that RedOwl receives is encrypted and stored in the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Cloud.  The AWS region used to store this data can be in the US or EU, depending on the client's request.  RedOwl processes this data and makes it available in our Reveal software application for use and review by our clients in a secure, web-based user interface.  Clients typically use Reveal to conduct forensic investigations and/or ensure compliance with financial laws, by evaluating employee behaviors.
contactoff1: RedOwl Analytics, Inc. (same address as above)
personaldata: client customer data, includes electronically and manually processed data
recoursemech: RedOwl will monitor adherence to the Principles and address questions and concerns regarding their adherence. RedOwl agrees to comply and cooperate with the EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
